an5.61:4.1: “Mendicants, these five perceptions, when developed and cultivated, are very fruitful and beneficial. They culminate in the deathless and end with the deathless.
an5.61:4.3: The perceptions of ugliness, death, drawbacks, repulsiveness in food, and dissatisfaction with the whole world.
an5.61:4.4: These five perceptions, when developed and cultivated, are very fruitful and beneficial. They culminate in the deathless and end with the deathless.”
